Clawterparty Bath Bank Atelier

Favors held in escrow. Tailoring cut on bias.

Clawterparty is the first feline-first reserve institution to underwrite social obligations and convert them into season-ready garments. Every collar, coat, and trench is priced in honored favors, notarized by whiskerprint, and released from our marble bathtub clearing room.

Vestibule Riddle

Entry to member pricing requires one correct answer. Read slowly: "I have keys but open no locks. I have space but no room. You can enter, but cannot go outside."

Current lines from the tub floor

Our design desk works shoulder-to-shoulder with the obligation desk. When a favor matures, it funds a production run. This season includes diplomatic rainwear for apology tours, velvet officewear for debt settlement dinners, and claw-friendly evening gloves.

The String Theory Trench

Double-breasted weatherproof shell with hidden pocket for promissory fish. Lining printed with municipal nap maps. Popular with mediators, magistrates, and cats who prefer dramatic exits through side doors.

Debit & Biscuit Suiting

Precision-cut tailoring in electric blue twill. Each lapel includes detachable paw tabs for formal kneading. Tailored in-house by Comptroller Mewsly while balancing ledger books on the faucet.

Lime Collateral Knit Set

Soft-structure knitwear that breathes during negotiations and clings during rooftop wind events. Every set includes an emergency clause pocket and a certified lint pardon card.

Reading Room, Filing Room, Grooming Room

We publish heavily because trust grows when minutes are clear. Browse dispatches, personnel biographies, and signed customer letters archived by quarter.

Press Bulletin: Spring Settlement Capsule Opens Monday

Clawterparty Bath Bank Atelier confirms release of the Spring Settlement Capsule, a six-look collection built around reciprocal dressing. The capsule was financed by 812 fulfilled favors, including school pickup rotations, emergency soup delivery, and one highly rated tax-season babysitting run.

Chief Soak Officer Tatiana Purrkova noted that liquidity remains stable despite recent demand for satin arbitration cloaks. "Our clients need garments that negotiate before they speak," she wrote in the quarterly tubside letter. "A well-cut sleeve can reduce the temperature in any room by three emotional degrees."

Membership terms & favor pricing

All plans include fitting access, valuation review, and one claw-safe alteration window. Favors are audited monthly and never sold to third parties. If a favor expires, we convert it to a community credit and publish the adjustment in the public ledger.

FAQ

Why the riddle?

The threshold keeps our queue deliberate and deters impulse pledging. Thoughtful entry improves repayment quality and fitting outcomes.

Where is headquarters exactly?

Our registered office occupies a reinforced clawfoot bathtub in the old exchange building. Visiting hours are listed in weekly bulletins.

Can I repay favors early?

Yes. Early fulfillment earns a grooming credit and increases access to limited textile drops.
